titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for restraint of excessiue carriages, to the destruction of the high vvayes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie and by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the Court at Hampton-Court, the first day of Nouember, in the eleuenth yeere of Our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
